650170.name: Hue Defense: Original Soundtrack
650170.description:
Hue Defense: Original Soundtrack


The 50-minute soundtrack has been remixed, high quality source material.
Includes three high quality formats MP3 (320 kbps), FLAC and AAC.

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\Steam\steamapps\common\Hue Defense\#SOUNDTRACK\

Track List:

Artists / Composers: Luiz Fernando Mendes Viana, Prismatic Visionary Music


Disc1
  • 01. Time Run
  • 02. Risk Zone
  • 03. Between Choices
  • 04. Old Eletronics
  • 05. Midnight Dance
  • 06. Memories of The Past
  • 07. Jungle Dwellers
  • 08. Waters of Live
  • 09. Final Requiem
  • 10. Nightmare Escape
  • 11. Salvenos
  • 12. Sunny Morning
  • 13. Samba Box
  • 14. Huenation
650170.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
